resources.string: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS settings (settingName TEXT PRIMARY KEY, settingValue TEXT, visible INTEGER);
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS personalInfo (_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, fullName TEXT, address TEXT, phone TEXT, eMail TEXT, localClub TEXT);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS objects (_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, designation TEXT, commonName TEXT, type TEXT, magnitude FLOAT, size TEXT, distance TEXT, constellation TEXT, season TEXT, rightAscension TEXT, declination TEXT, catalog TEXT, otherCatalogs TEXT, imageResource TEXT, nightImageResource TEXT, logged TEXT, logDate TEXT, logTime TEXT, logLocation TEXT, equipment TEXT, seeing INTEGER, transparency INTEGER, favorite TEXT, findingMethod TEXT, viewingNotes TEXT);
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS locations (_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, locationName TEXT, coordinates TEXT, description TEXT);
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS telescopes (_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, type TEXT, primaryDiameter TEXT, focalRatio TEXT, focalLength TEXT);
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS eyepieces (_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, focalLength TEXT, type TEXT);
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS targetLists (_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, listName TEXT, listDescription TEXT, creationDate TEXT);
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS targetListItems (_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, list TEXT, isObject TEXT, objectDesignation TEXT, itemDescription TEXT);
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS availableCatalogs (catalogName TEXT PRIMARY KEY, installed TEXT, numberOfObjects INTEGER, description TEXT, size TEXT);
